title: Full Show (49ers trade for Christian McCaffrey, Clippers beat Lakers, Dak to start against Lions)
description:
00:00 Lakers lose home opener to Clippers 103-97
22:42 49ers trade for Christian McCaffrey
46:51 Dak Prescott says he will start on Sunday against the Lions
1:06:24 76ers fall to the Bucks 90-88; Joel Embiid goes scoreless in the second half. What happened to the Sixers center?
1:17:54 Does Tom Brady’s performance on the field suggest he should be considering retirement?
1:34:45 How much is Russ to blame after going 0 for 11 last night in Lakers loss to the Clippers?
1:43:18 Jerry Jones publicly criticizes Mike McCarthy for not challenging a play in the SNF loss to the Eagles
1:49:34 DeSean Jackson compares Lamar Jackson to Michael Vick after signing with the Ravens earlier in the week
1:54:57 Should the 49ers rush to play CMC against the Chiefs this Sunday?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
